pullRequest.body:
This contribution was created as part of the AIM workshop "Formalizing Algebraic Geometry" in June 2024.

Co-authored-by: Michael Stoll <Michael.Stoll@uni-bayreuth.de>
Co-authored-by: Junyan Xu <junyanxu.math@gmail.com>

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [6e2633b2d0](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14130/commits/6e2633b2d01eb66c306f9e3864d2994fb613c95f)

#### Import changes

No significant changes to the import graph

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ AlgHom.equivHomOver`

`+ Algebra.mkOver`
`+ Algebra.schemeSpec`
`+ Algebra.schemeSpecOver`
`+ CategoryTheory.Functor.FullyFaithful.mapOver`

`+ CategoryTheory.Functor.mapOver_hom`
`+ Point.equivSchemeOver`
`+ _root_.adjoinRootAlgHomEquiv`
`+ _root_.quotientIdealSpanSingletonAlgHomEquiv`

`+ algHomPolynomialâ‚‚Equiv`

`+ equivEquation`
`+ equivEquationSubtype`
`+ equivNonsingular`

`+ evalEval_map_mapRingHom_algebraMap`
`+ instance : GradedAlgebra W.quotientGrading`
`+ instance : GradedRing <| homogeneousSubmodule (Fin 3) R`
`+ isHomogeneous_polynomial`
`+ isHomogeneous_span_polynomial`
`+ mk'`
`+ nonsingular'`
`+ quotientGrading`
`++ SchemePoint`
`++ SchemePointOver`
`++ scheme`
`++ schemeOver`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

</details>

@Multramate @alreadydone Both #14167 and #14130 add the file `Mathlib/AlgebraicGeometry/EllipticCurve/Scheme.lean`. But with different contents. Could you please coordinate what should be in which PR, and how to move these PRs along? Possibly (common) prerequisites should be factored out into separate PRs. Feel free to start a discussion about this on Zulip.

(crossposting this on the other PR as well)
I would suggest that stuff about the affine scheme should stay in this PR, and I'll remove the stuff about the projective scheme.

pullRequest.title: feat(AlgebraicGeometry/EllipticCurve/Scheme): define the affine scheme associated to an elliptic curve

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicGeometry/EllipticCurve/Projective): add API for equations and nonsingularity
feat: Group scheme structure on Weierstrass curve
feat(AlgebraicGeometry/EllipticCurve/Affine): add equivalences between points and explicit WithZero types

nodes.body:
@Multramate @alreadydone Both #14167 and #14130 add the file `Mathlib/AlgebraicGeometry/EllipticCurve/Scheme.lean`. But with different contents. Could you please coordinate what should be in which PR, and how to move these PRs along? Possibly (common) prerequisites should be factored out into separate PRs. Feel free to start a discussion about this on Zulip.
